overview.tax_residency_rules: Individuals are considered tax residents if they spend 183 days or more in the country in a tax year.
overview.tax_authority: Public Authority for Zakat and Taxation
overview.tax_filing_frequency: Annually, by April 30th for individuals and corporations.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: All types of personal income are exempt from tax.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: All types of capital gains are exempt from tax.

vat_gst.exemptions: All supplies of goods and services are exempt from VAT.

property_tax.exemptions: All types of property are exempt from property tax.

inheritance_tax.exemptions: All types of inheritances are exempt from tax.

wealth_tax.exemptions: All types of wealth are exempt from wealth tax.

additional_notes.political_risks: Kuwait has a stable political environment.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Kuwait has a high income economy with low inflation and a stable currency.
additional_notes.legal_system: Kuwait has a well-developed legal system.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 61st in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
